categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Hooll was a male Chiss who was a private in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War against the Galactic Republic, when he was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock.

Private Hooll appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as the Voss Modification Commendations vendor on Vaiken Spacedock, though he was later relabeled as the Level 48 Modification Vendor.
